testcase.system-out: #Kevin Gallagher #12/22/2016 #v1.0.0 #Feature to validate elements on the home page. Feature: Syncpanel2 home page testing As an administrator at Syncbak, I want to make sure all the elements on the home page are there, In order to ensure quality product for my clients.
